name: Rockboy
description:
• Help Rockboy escapes the falling rocks!
• Take risks in the dangerous rock valley!
• Tap Anywhere to find the safe place quickly!
• At the end, Screams will echo in the mountain! (>□<)
• Wearing headphones is better.

Rockboy Features:
• First Huge Rock adventure game in the world!
• Unlimited levels! All levels are available and seamless!
• Extremely thrilling game! begin your adventure now!

Website: yasuhati.com

Enjoy Rockboy! Scream Now!
